name: PayPal
natural_language_description: 这是 PayPal 节点。主要用于: Consume PayPal API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: payout

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Cancel (值: cancel) - Cancels an unclaimed payout item
Get (值: get) - Show payout item details

senderBatchId.name: senderBatchId
senderBatchId.description: A sender-specified ID number. Tracks the payout in an accounting system.
senderBatchId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sender Batch ID | 作用: A sender-specified ID number. Tracks the payout in an accounting system. | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

itemsUi.name: itemsUi
itemsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Items | 默认值: {}

itemsJson.name: itemsJson
itemsJson.description: An array of individual payout items
itemsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Items | 作用: An array of individual payout items

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: emailSubject (值: None) - The subject line for the email that PayPal sends when payment for a payout item completes. The subject line is the same for all recipients. Max length: 255 characters.
emailMessage (值: None) - The email message that PayPal sends when the payout item completes. The message is the same for all recipients.
note (值: None) - The payouts and item-level notes are concatenated in the email. Max length: 1000 characters.

payoutBatchId.name: payoutBatchId
payoutBatchId.description: The ID of the payout for which to show details
payoutBatchId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Payout Batch ID | 作用: The ID of the payout for which to show details | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

payoutItemId.name: payoutItemId
payoutItemId.description: The ID of the payout item to cancel
payoutItemId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Payout Item ID | 作用: The ID of the payout item to cancel | (必填项)
